settings.title: Pregnancy
settings.bra-family-description: Key words: super soft + stretchy. Pieces that feel like heaven on the skin and flex with a changing body.

settings.title: Gifts
settings.bra-family-description: For a baby shower (or a gift to self), if anyone is deserving of useful luxuries, it's a new mom.

settings.title: On Pregnancy
settings.quote: The human body is truly an incredible thing. Before my pregnancies and delivering my babies, I did not appreciate what my body was capable of. I now have a deep respect and awareness for how strong and resilient my body is.

settings.title: Newborn
settings.bra-family-description: A messy moment for sure, but full of love. Pieces designed for nursing, sleeping, recovering, washing, repeating.

settings.title: #momlife
settings.bra-family-description: Feeling like your (new) self again. Everyday, go-to staples that make you feel pulled together as everything else evolves.

settings.title: On #Momlife
settings.quote: Becoming a mama is empowering, all-encompassing, overwhelming, eye-opening and heart-bursting - all at once. It's an impossible juggle. It's also falling in love every day.

settings.footer-headline: Some mamas we love, in Negative
